message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm proposing a starting price of $14,000.  I'm confident this is a fair offer considering its potential worth.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering its value to me.
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective on the pricing. However, $10,500 is significantly lower than what I have in mind.  Could you consider a counteroffer closer to $13,000?
I appreciate your flexibility, but $13,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to meet you halfway at $11,500. Can we discuss further?
